actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Veterans' Affairs.

official_title: A bill to restore the eligibility of certain widows for gratuitous insurance issued pursuant to section 602(d) of the National Service Life Insurance Act of 1940.

summary.text: Provides that specified provisions relating to the remarriage of a widow of a veteran shall not apply with respect to a claim filed for gratuitous death benefits (pursuant to the National Service Life Insurance Act) in the case of any widow (including the widow of any member of the Philippine Scouts or Filipino Guerrilla Forces) who has been, and, but for this Act, would continue to be, denied payments of insurance by reason of remarriage, conduct inferring remarriage, or conduct (if terminated) relating to adulterous cohabitation.

titles.title: A bill to restore the eligibility of certain widows for gratuitous insurance issued pursuant to section 602(d) of the National Service Life Insurance Act of 1940.
